intro: Carpodinus cirrhosa, commonly known as the slender sandwort, is a low-growing perennial plant native to arid and semi-arid regions. Carpodinus cirrhosa is often found in sandy or gravelly soils and is adapted to withstand high temperatures and low rainfall.
